text: Ara yakhana tadera kache patha kara haya amadera suspasta banisamuha, yara amadera sathe mulakatera asa kare na tara bale -- ''e chara an'ya eka kura'ana ano athaba eti badala'o.’’ Balo, ''eke amara nijera icchaya badalano amara kaja naya. Amara kache ya pratyadista haya sudhu tara'i ami anusarana kari. Ami alabat bhaya kari, -- yadi ami amara prabhura abadhya ha'i, -- eka bhayankara dinera sastira.’’
